projects.title: Airline Backend System
projects.description: Microservice based backend system, Rest api, Authentication using JWT, bcrypt encryption on password, Mysql database design, ORM Sequelize, Message Queue (rabbitMQ) implemented in reminder service for sending email/sms for the fight, Api Gateway for rate limiting

projects.title: MERN Stack Quiz App
projects.description: Built using html, css, javascript ,react, redux and express. User Authorization and Controllers used. Database: mongodb

projects.description: Using html, css, javascript ,react,Hooks, Router, Axios, redux, Node , Express . User Authorization  Database: mongodb
